original_text: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the Lord, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
korean_text: 칠칠절 처음 익은 열매를 드리는 날에 너희가 여호와께 새 소제를 드릴 때에도 성회로 모일 것이요 아무 일도 하지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: Also in the day of the firstfruits
when ye bring a new meat offering unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 주께 새 소제를 드릴 때

sentences.original_text: ye shall have an holy convocation
ye shall do no servile work
